block.minecraft.andesite.tooltip.behavio: Can be _renewed_ by _compacting_ some _Gravel_, _Flint_ and _Lava_ in a _Basin_. _Cobblestone_ and _Diorite_ can also be _mixed_ together in a shapeless recipe.
block.minecraft.cobblestone.tooltip.beha: Can be used in making _Diorite_ which can then be used to make _Andesite_ for easy creation of _Andesite Alloy_.
Turns into _Gravel_ which can be _washed_ for more _useful_ materials.
block.minecraft.gravel.tooltip.behaviour: Has a chance of revealing _iron nuggets_ and _flint_.
block.minecraft.dried_kelp_block.tooltip: Now turns into _coal_ when given sufficient _heat_ and _pressure_.
block.minecraft.netherrack.tooltip.summa: Now has _additional uses_ in recipes and can be _infinitely_ renewed.
block.minecraft.netherrack.tooltip.behav: Used for making _Blaze Cakes_ or _redstone_ when _crushed_ into Cinder Flour. Can also rarely produce _Netherite Scrap_ when crushed.
Can be renewed with _Instant Health II_ which can be fully automated with quite a few Mechanical Mixers and Blaze Burners.
block.minecraft.coal_block.tooltip.behav: Now turns into _diamonds_ when given sufficient _heat_ and _pressure_.
block.minecraft.diamond_block.tooltip.be: Can be _infinitely_ renewed from _compacting_ coal blocks in a _superheated_ basin.
block.minecraft.beacon.tooltip.summary: Gives _positive_ effects to players in a certain radius. Requires a base built out of precious materials to function!
item.minecraft.glass_bottle.tooltip.summ: Now has _additional uses_ in this modpack.
item.minecraft.glass_bottle.tooltip.beha: Places down a _butterfly jar_ to give butterflies a home.
item.minecraft.glass_bottle.tooltip.cond: When combined with a Dragon Egg in a crafting grid
item.minecraft.lapis_lazuli.tooltip.beha: Other than _enchanting_ purposes, you can _haunt_ it to get _prismarine_ shards and crystals.
Other than _clerics_, lapis lazuli can now be acquired from _witches_.
block.minecraft.pointed_dripstone.toolti: Can now be used in making _Tridents_.
block.minecraft.pumpkin.tooltip.summary: In addition to being used as an ingredient, it now has other uses.
block.minecraft.pumpkin.tooltip.behaviou: _Scares_ away crows who are likely to take your crops.
block.minecraft.cobbled_deepslate.toolti: Produces _Deepslate Shards_ which can be _haunted_ to be transformed into different items.
item.minecraft.wooden_pickaxe.tooltip.su: You can now _repair_ tools with the material they are made of.
item.minecraft.wooden_pickaxe.tooltip.be: Put your tool and its respective crafting material in a crafting grid.
If you were wondering... yes, this also applies to Diamond and Netherite tools as well. This tooltip will not appear on Diamond and Netherite tools.
item.minecraft.stone_pickaxe.tooltip.sum: You can now _repair_ tools with the material they are made of.
item.minecraft.stone_pickaxe.tooltip.beh: Put your tool and its respective crafting material in a crafting grid.
If you were wondering... yes, this also applies to Diamond and Netherite tools as well. This tooltip will not appear on Diamond and Netherite tools.
item.minecraft.iron_pickaxe.tooltip.summ: You can now _repair_ tools with the material they are made of.
item.minecraft.iron_pickaxe.tooltip.beha: Put your tool and its respective crafting material in a crafting grid.
If you were wondering... yes, this also applies to Diamond and Netherite tools as well. This tooltip will not appear on Diamond and Netherite tools.
block.minecraft.campfire.tooltip.summary: Useful for _cooking_ food and other functionalities. See below!
block.minecraft.campfire.tooltip.conditi: When placed in front of a powered Encased Fan:
block.minecraft.soul_campfire.tooltip.su: _Repels_ piglins in addition to cooking food and other functionalities. See below!
block.minecraft.soul_campfire.tooltip.co: When placed in front of a powered Encased Fan:
item.minecraft.rotten_flesh.tooltip.summ: Now has _additional uses_ in multiple recipes.
item.minecraft.rotten_flesh.tooltip.beha: Is the basis of creating _enriched_ soil for _higher_ crop yields.
item.minecraft.bone_meal.tooltip.summary: Used for _accelerating_ the _growth_ of plants. However, it can now _universally_ bone meal _a lot more things_ compared to before!
item.minecraft.bone_meal.tooltip.conditi: On right click on plants or crops:
On right click on grass blocks:
On right click on Sea Pickles on living coral blocks:
Now has a _purpose_ and can _actually_ make arrows!
It can now _craft_ arrows along with other _types_ of arrows.
item.minecraft.nether_star.tooltip.behav: Used in waking up _The Harbinger_ in the _Ancient Factory_ located deep underground in the _Overworld_.
item.kubejs.denied_result.tooltip.summar: <shake>This item now has a different method <shake>or methods of crafting.</shake>
item.kubejs.deepslate_shard.tooltip.beha: Has a _chance_ of turning into an _Echo Shard_ or _disc fragment_.
block.kubejs.command_block.tooltip.summa: Not actually a true command block, but it can still do _certain_ things.
block.kubejs.chain_command_block.tooltip: Not actually a true command block, but it can still do _certain_ things.
block.kubejs.repeating_command_block.too: Not actually a true command block, but it can still do _certain_ things.
item.kubejs.final_pickaxe.tooltip.summar: Tear through mountains without a care in the world.
item.kubejs.final_pickaxe.tooltip.behavi: _Apotheosis_ can make this tool _destroy a chunk at a time_. _It does not matter what block type it is!_ Don't say I warned you! If you do happen to get the perfect affix, simply hold _[Shift]_ to destroy blocks with _precision_.
item.kubejs.final_axe.tooltip.behaviour1: _Apotheosis_ can make this tool _destroy a chunk at a time_. _It does not matter what block type it is!_ Don't say I warned you! If you do happen to get the perfect affix, simply hold _[Shift]_ to destroy blocks with _precision_.
item.kubejs.final_shovel.tooltip.behavio: _Apotheosis_ can make this tool _destroy a chunk at a time_. _It does not matter what block type it is!_ Don't say I warned you! If you do happen to get the perfect affix, simply hold _[Shift]_ to destroy blocks with _precision_.
item.kubejs.final_hoe.tooltip.behaviour1: _Apotheosis_ can make this tool _destroy a chunk at a time_. _It does not matter what block type it is!_ Don't say I warned you! If you do happen to get the perfect affix, simply hold _[Shift]_ to destroy blocks with _precision_.
item.kubejs.final_sword.tooltip.summary: Wield the _power_ of the event horizon in your hands.
item.kubejs.final_lance.tooltip.summary: Attack from long distances with _ease_ with piercing shadows.
item.kubejs.final_helmet.tooltip.summary: Significantly _reduces_ damage when worn by itself.
item.kubejs.final_helmet.tooltip.behavio: Become _invulnerable_ to _all_ damage, including falling out of the world.
item.kubejs.final_chestplate.tooltip.sum: Significantly _reduces_ damage when worn by itself.
item.kubejs.final_chestplate.tooltip.beh: Become _invulnerable_ to _all_ damage, including falling out of the world.
item.kubejs.final_leggings.tooltip.summa: Significantly _reduces_ damage when worn by itself.
item.kubejs.final_leggings.tooltip.behav: Become _invulnerable_ to _all_ damage, including falling out of the world.
item.kubejs.final_boots.tooltip.summary: Significantly _reduces_ damage when worn by itself.
item.kubejs.final_boots.tooltip.behaviou: Become _invulnerable_ to _all_ damage, including falling out of the world.
item.eccentrictome.tome.tooltip.summary: <rainb>Condenses many tools and books into one.</rainb> Elegantly <rainb>presents</rainb> all the tools and ooks stored within it upon right click.
item.eccentrictome.tome.tooltip.behaviou: Combine _while in book form_ in a crafting grid _with_ the item you want to store. Pickaxes, axes, shovels, hoes, shears, the _Wand of Symmetry_ and _Wrench_ from Create are all permitted.
<shake>DO NOT USE AS A CRAFTING INGREDIENT OR YOU WILL LOSE ALL STORED ITEMS!</shake>
item.eccentrictome.tome.tooltip.control2: Shift + Left Click (while transformed as another item)
item.eccentrictome.tome.tooltip.action2: To _remove_ items from the reality breaking pocket universe within this book, simply _crouch_ and drop with the item you want to remove.
item.eccentrictome.tome.tooltip.control3: On Left click while not looking at a block
item.eccentrictome.tome.tooltip.action3: _Returns_ the tome back to its original form. Just make sure to be punching the air and not a block.
A maple log with sap flowing out.
When right clicked with a glass bottle
Extracts the sap and converts it into an ordinary wooden log.
block.autumnity.sappy_maple_wood.tooltip: Extracts the sap and converts it into an ordinary wood block.
item.backpacked.backpack.tooltip.summary: Provides lots of _storage_ for your travels.
item.backpacked.backpack.tooltip.behavio: To access your _backpack_ simply press _[B]_. Your backpack can also be _enchanted_ with enchantments that will prove useful.
After _completing_ certain _challenges_, you _unlock_ new <rainb>looks</rainb> for your backpack!
item.cataclysm.infernal_forge.tooltip.su: A _devastating_ hammer. Also important to note, this is actually a pickaxe.
item.cataclysm.infernal_forge.tooltip.co: On R-click while looking at a block
item.cataclysm.infernal_forge.tooltip.be: Causes AoE damage around yourself and sends mobs flying.
item.cataclysm.monstrous_helm.tooltip.su: Falling below _half_ of your HP will push away entities and _grant_ buffs.
item.cataclysm.monstrous_helm.tooltip.be: You are given additional Defense, Knockback Resistance and Regeneration.
item.cataclysm.the_incinerator.tooltip.b: Hold _right click_ for 3 seconds until you hear a sound. After _hearing_ the roar of the flames, let go to unleash _devastation_ in a _straight line_.
Dropped items in the line of fire will be destroyed!
item.cataclysm.bulwark_of_the_flame.tool: Functions regularly like a shield, but with a charge ability.
While _sneaking_ and _blocking_, let go of right click to charge forward. Entities that collide with a wall are stunned from the impact and take additional damage.
item.cataclysm.void_scatter_arrow.toolti: This arrow _explodes_ on impact, creating many _fragments_ in the process.
item.cataclysm.void_core.tooltip.summary: A special object that can be used as a weapon.
item.cataclysm.void_core.tooltip.behavio: Right click on the ground to cause Void Rune _spikes_ to _erupt_ in a straight line in front of you.
item.cataclysm.gauntlet_of_guard.tooltip: A very hard punching glove with special abilities.
When held in your main hand, you can _pull_ entities _towards_ you by holding right click. Be sure to give them a golden punch afterwards!
item.cataclysm.ignitium_chestplate.toolt: You can combine an Elytra with this in the Smithing Table.
item.cataclysm.ignitium_leggings.tooltip: The developer, _L_Ender_ says 'Flame Reflex' ...but the item fails to give any form of Fire Resistance.
item.cataclysm.ignitium_boots.tooltip.su: Lava Walker, allows you to walk on lava. DOES NOT provide Fire Resistance, even with the full set!
item.cataclysm.wither_assault_shoulder_w: A rocket launcher that _shoots_ projectiles laced with the _wither_ effect.
_Hold_ and _release_ right click to _fire_ a _Wither Missile_ that travels in a _straight line_ and explodes on contact.

_Hold [Shift]_ to use the _alt fire_ which fires a _Wither Howitzer_ projectile that follows an _arced_ path. Upon contact, the Howitzer projectile leaves behind _lingering smoke_ that applies the _wither_ effect.
item.cataclysm.void_forge.tooltip.summar: The power of a supernova is contained within. Yes, this is _still a pickaxe_.
item.cataclysm.void_forge.tooltip.behavi: Now creates a _fan of void spikes_ when you _right click_ a block, in addition to sending mobs flying.
item.cataclysm.gauntlet_of_bulwark.toolt: A fist with the _punching_ power of planets colliding.

Hold right click to _push_ nearby entities and give them the _Blazing Brand_ debuff. _Releasing_ right click will make you _charge_ forward and deal damage to the entities hit by you. Entities that hit the wall take a lot of damage.
item.cataclysm.void_assault_shoulder_wea: The _upgraded_ version of the Wither Assault Shoulder Weapon. The power of supernovae contained within each projectile.
You can now _shoot_ Void Howitzer projectiles which now _create_ a tsunami of void spikes on impact.
item.cataclysm.tidal_claws.tooltip.summa: _Long ranged_ and _deadly_. Also serves as a grappling hook.
item.cataclysm.tidal_claws.tooltip.behav: Left click to attack _multiple_ entities with a single tentacle. Applies a _stacking_ debuff.
Right click to use as a grappling hook. Remember that it has _limited_ range!
item.cataclysm.abyssal_egg.tooltip.summa: You emerge as victor, but now you have an egg in your possession.
item.cataclysm.abyssal_egg.tooltip.behav: Probably best to make sure you have some tropical fish to feed your adorable Leviathan once it hatches.
item.chalk.chalk_box.tooltip.summary: Allows you to use _store_ and _switch_ between chalks. It also allows you to add a _glowing_ effect to your chalk if you have any _glow ink sacs_ in the special slot.
item.chalk.chalk_box.tooltip.condition1: On right click while not looking at any blocks
item.chalk.chalk_box.tooltip.behaviour1: Opens the GUI for access to stored chalks.
item.chalk.chalk_box.tooltip.behaviour2: Marks are drawn with the _leftmost chalk_ in order. To change _active_ chalk, simply _[Shift]_ + _[R-click]_ while _not looking_ at any block with the Chalk Box in hand.
item.chalk.black_chalk.tooltip.summary: Useful for planning, navigation and drawing. Can be stored in the _Chalk Box_ for easier management and utility. Additional symbols are unlocked through advancements.
item.chalk.black_chalk.tooltip.behaviour: Right click on a block face to _draw_ a mark. Depending on the _angle_ and _distance_ away from the _center_ of the block, the _direction_ of your drawing will change. A _dot mark_ is drawn by clicking in the center of the block.
Allows you to change different symbols.
Simply right click as if you were using the chalk in the first place.
item.chalk.blue_chalk.tooltip.summary: Useful for planning, navigation and drawing. Can be stored in the _Chalk Box_ for easier management and utility. Additional symbols are unlocked through advancements.
item.chalk.blue_chalk.tooltip.behaviour1: Right click on a block face to _draw_ a mark. Depending on the _angle_ and _distance_ away from the _center_ of the block, the _direction_ of your drawing will change. A _dot mark_ is drawn by clicking in the center of the block.
item.chalk.blue_chalk.tooltip.behaviour2: Allows you to change different symbols.
item.chalk.blue_chalk.tooltip.behaviour3: Simply right click as if you were using the chalk in the first place.
item.chalk.brown_chalk.tooltip.summary: Useful for planning, navigation and drawing. Can be stored in the _Chalk Box_ for easier management and utility. Additional symbols are unlocked through advancements.

Allows you to change different symbols.
Simply right click as if you were using the chalk in the first place.

item.chalk.cyan_chalk.tooltip.behaviour2: Allows you to change different symbols.
item.chalk.cyan_chalk.tooltip.behaviour3: Simply right click as if you were using the chalk in the first place.

item.chalk.gray_chalk.tooltip.behaviour2: Allows you to change different symbols.
item.chalk.gray_chalk.tooltip.behaviour3: Simply right click as if you were using the chalk in the first place.

Allows you to change different symbols.
Simply right click as if you were using the chalk in the first place.

Allows you to change different symbols.
Simply right click as if you were using the chalk in the first place.
item.chalk.yellow_chalk.tooltip.summary: Useful for planning, navigation and drawing. Can be stored in the _Chalk Box_ for easier management and utility. Additional symbols are unlocked through advancements.
item.chalk.yellow_chalk.tooltip.behaviou: Right click on a block face to _draw_ a mark. Depending on the _angle_ and _distance_ away from the _center_ of the block, the _direction_ of your drawing will change. A _dot mark_ is drawn by clicking in the center of the block.
Allows you to change different symbols.
Simply right click as if you were using the chalk in the first place.
item.cloudstorage.balloon_bit.tooltip.su: With the power of the Crafting Table, you can make a new _balloon_ from _these pieces_.
item.cloudstorage.balloon_bit.condition1: On right click as a balloon
item.cloudstorage.balloon_bit.behaviour1: _Assigns_ the _Cloud Chest_ or _Static Cloud Chest_ that respective channel. Static Cloud Chests require a balloon with a _static charge_.
block.cloudstorage.cloud_chest.tooltip.s: Personal and private. It's expandable too!
block.cloudstorage.cloud_chest.tooltip.b: Firstly, craft a few chests. Then using the _same balloon assigned_ to your Cloud Chest, send them up to the sky... literally.
Right click the cloud chest with a _normal_ balloon in your hand, not one with a static charge.
block.cloudstorage.static_cloud_chest.to: Unlike the normal cloud chest, a static cloud chest uses balloons with a _static charge_. So if you want to expand storage for your static cloud chest MAKE SURE you use balloons with a _static charge_.
The process is similar to the regular cloud chest, just use balloons with a _static charge_.
item.extendedcrafting.handheld_table.too: You _never_ have to use a Crafting Table block again! It is literally a hand held Crafting Table, what more can you ask for?
block.farmersdelight.skillet.tooltip.sum: The skillet can be used to _cook_ food over an open flame or a stove. It can also be occasionally used as a weapon should the need ever arise.
block.farmersdelight.skillet.tooltip.con: When held over an open flame or stove
block.farmersdelight.skillet.tooltip.beh: Cooks one food item at a time at a faster speed than a campfire.
block.farmersdelight.skillet.tooltip.con: On holding right click while holding ingredients in off-hand
block.farmersdelight.skillet.tooltip.beh: Cooks ingredients over an open flame or a stove.
Can be utilized as a weapon.
item.quark.abacus.tooltip.summary: A tool used to measure distance.
item.quark.abacus.tooltip.behaviour1: Right click on a block face to measure distance.
item.salt.salt.tooltip.summary: Food can now be salted to improve the _taste_ and add _nutrition_.
item.salt.salt.tooltip.behaviour1: Combine with food tagged with _'salt:can_be_salted'_ tag. Multiple mods, including _Farmer's Delight_ are _natively supported_.
item.salt.salt.tooltip.behaviour2: Rock salt can generate underground in _dripstone caves_, the _ocean_ and _beach biomes_. When harvested, _Rock Salt Ore_ will drop _Raw Rock Salt_ which is then _crafted_ into _Salt_.
item.salt.salt.tooltip.behaviour3: Salt can be obtained by _growing_ your own Salt Crystals or by the _evaporation_ of water in a cauldron.
item.salt.salt.tooltip.behaviour4: Salt blocks will _melt_ adjacent ice and snow blocks. Ice and snow can also be _melted_ by _sprinkling salt_ over them.
item.tempad.tempad.tooltip.summary: Has unlimited uses. Enjoy! Just wait for a 30 second cooldown after use.
item.tempad.tempad.tooltip.behaviour1: Allows teleportation and creating portals at set locations.
